{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20631v1", "title": "Trace ideal criteria for generalized integration operators", "summary": "For $g \in \operatorname{Hol}(\mathbb D)$, we study the class of generalized
integration operators $T_{g,a}$, acting on Hardy and Bergman spaces of the unit
disc in the complex plane. This class of integral operators were introduced to
study factorization theorems in the Hardy spaces of the unit disc. We
completely characterize the space of symbols g, for which $T_{g,a}$ belongs to
the Schatten-von Neumann ideals of the Hardy and Bergman spaces.", "main_category": "math.CV", "categories": "math.CV,math.FA", "published": "2025-04-29T11:00:20Z"}
